old:
フィンダム大陸中部に広がる平原
起伏が多いフィンダムにおいて、ファーラナ平原は
なだらかで活用しやすい地形をしている
また、他の地域と比較すると侵食の度合は
緩やかなようで侵食魔の数も少ない
new:
The Farana Plains, located in the central part of the Phindym continent, are characterized by gently rolling terrain, making them easy to utilize in the varied landscape of Phindym.
Furthermore, compared to other regions, the level of corruption is relatively low, resulting in fewer corrupted creatures.

old:
フィンダム大陸の中央部
精霊竜がねぐらとしている《芯なる樹》が
青々と生い茂る様は、フィンダム大陸の
どの拠点からでも眺めることができる
人々はその壮大さに確かな加護を感じて過ごしていた
new:
In the central part of the Phindym continent, the Spirit Dragon's habitat, the "Core Tree", thrives with lush greenery, which can be observed from any stronghold in Phindym.
People feel a definite blessing in its grandeur as they go about their lives.

old:
ファーラナ平原に位置する戦士の村
武勇を最も尊ぶ部族が住まい、住人たちは
日々鍛錬と戦いに明け暮れている
力に裏付けされてか、地理的な理由に寄るものか
比較的侵食の影響を受けずに生活している
new:
A village of warriors located in the Farana Plains.
The inhabitants, who hold valor in the highest regard, spend their days immersed in training and battles. 
Whether supported by their strength or due to geographical reasons, they live relatively unaffected by corruption.

old:
ダナの村の近くに佇む庵
《スピリットランサー》のジョブマスターである
勇壮な槍士アデルドナハが住んでいる
見込みのある者に対しては、自身のもつ
技術を伝授することもあるという
new:
Near Dana Village stands a hermitage, where the brave Job Master of the Spirit Lancers, Adair Donnchadh, resides. 
It is said that he also imparts his skills to promising individuals.

old:
ファーラナ平原の片隅、大岩の割れ目に
隠れるようにして作られた小さな集落
一切の外部との交流を断った結果、非常に独特な
文化を形成するにいたった一族が住んでいる
new: In a corner of the Farana Plains, in a crack in a large rock, there lives a small hidden settlement inhabited by a tribe that has developed a very unique culture as a result of refusing all contact with the outside world.

old:
精霊竜が棲む《始まりの洞》下層に位置する拠点
精霊竜の守りをする者たちや訪れた人々が
暫しの休息を得るための場となっている
new:
Base camp located in the lower level of the Hollow of Beginnings, where the Spirit Dragon resides. 
It serves as a place for the protectors of the Spirit Dragon and for those who have visited to find temporary rest and respite.

old:
《芯なる樹》の最深部
侵食による影響が出るまでは、精霊竜との
謁見などはこの場所で行われていた
精霊竜の守りとして選ばれた者たちが控えていた
集いの間と隣接している
new:
The deepest part of the "Core Tree".
Until the effects of corruption took hold, meetings with the Spirit Dragon were held in this location.
Those chosen as guardians of the Spirit Dragon awaited in the adjacent Gathering Hall.

old:
ファーラナ平原にぽつりと佇む住居の遺跡
古くはこの場所にダナの村があったのだが
拓けた場という防御面の弱さが問題視され
地形が入り組み敵の進入を妨げる現在の
場に移り住んだ
new:
In the Farana Plains, stands the ruins of a dwelling, all by itself.
Long ago, there was a village called Dana in this place.
However, the vulnerability of this wide-open area in terms of defense was seen as an issue.
So they moved to the current location, where the terrain is intricate and hinders enemy infiltration.

old:
ファーラナ遺跡の周辺にある円形遺跡
在りし日は戦士たちが武を競う闘技場として
使用されていたらしいが、当時の柱などは
ほとんど倒壊してしまっているため
現在は特に注目されることもない
new:
The circular ruins near the Farana Ruins.
Used to be a battlefield where warriors competed, but most of the columns from that time have collapsed, so there is currently no particular attention given to it.

old:
ファーラナ平原の山肌にあるニュートの巣穴
そう深さは無く、食糧を貯蓄している様子も無いので
恐らく休息を得る目的で作られたのだろう
見張りを立てて交替で使用しているのか、入口
付近では常にニュートが目を光らせている
new:
On the mountainside of the Farana Plains, there is a Newt Den. 
It doesn't appear to be very deep, and there doesn't seem to be any stored food, so it was probably made for the purpose of resting. 
Near the entrance, the Newts always keep watch, taking turns to stand guard.

old:
ファーラナ平原の《マグサス古水路》入口付近、岩が
立ち並ぶ周辺。巨大な岩が数個露出している以外は
特に目立つものも無い場所であるが、鎧の擦れる音が
聞こえたり、視界の端に巨大な剣が見えたという
報告が絶えない
new:
Near the entrance of Magusas Ancient Watercourse in the Farana Plains, there is a surrounding area with rocks scattered about. 
Other than a few exposed giant rocks, there is nothing particularly noticeable about this place. 
However, there are constant reports of hearing the sound of armor scraping and seeing a giant sword at the edge of one's field of vision.

old:
ファーラナ平原奥地にある湿地帯
霧が発生しやすく視界が悪いことが多い
甲竜が棲息しており、目を凝らせば霧の
奥でゆっくりと動く巨影を確認することができる
new:
In the depths of the Farana Plains, there is a marshland where mist often forms, making visibility poor.
Beasts known as "Shell Dragons" reside there, and if you focus your eyes, you can confirm the slow-moving silhouette deep within the mist.

old:
ファーラナ平原とエラン水林を繋ぐ谷あい
の道、中ほどにある少し拓けた場所
周囲を崖に囲まれているため、大型の魔物が
身を隠して羽根を休めるための巣として
利用している
new:
A slightly open place in the middle of the road connecting the Farana Plains and the Elan Water Grove. 
The surrounding cliffs make it a nest for large monsters to hide and rest their wings.

old:
ファーラナ平原の川中に浮かぶ陸地
周辺は水深が浅く、水没してはいるものの
歩き回ることが可能。ただし、汚泥が流れ着く
ことも多いらしく、不浄の魔物がさ迷っている
こともある
new:
A piece of land floating in the middle of the river in the Farana Plains. 
The surrounding waters are shallow, allowing for exploration on foot, despite periodic submersion. 
However, it appears that mud and debris often accumulate here, leading to the presence of foul creatures wandering about.

old:
戦士の村であるダナ付近にある廟堂
ダナには、自らの武勇の証を立てるため
この廟堂に巣食う魔物を倒してみせるという
文化が存在する。ただし、かつては頻繁に行われて
いたらしいが、現代において使用されることはごく稀
new:
There is a shrine near the village of warriors, called Dana.
In order to prove their bravery, there is a cultural tradition of defeating the monsters that inhabit this shrine.
However, it is very rare for this tradition to be practiced in modern times.

old:
古代に住居として使用されていたらしき洞窟
最近はピクシーが棲みつき、人間が足を
踏み入れることは難しい状況にある。奥は猛獣が
縄張りとしているとの情報もあったが
ピクシーたちが必死に通路を塞いだようだ
new:
It appears that this cave was once used as a dwelling in ancient times. 
Recently, it has been inhabited by pixies, making it difficult for humans to enter. 
There is also information that there are fierce animals deep inside, but it seems that the pixies have desperately blocked the passage.

old:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ファーラナ平原中で最大規模の遺跡
多少崩壊している箇所もあるが全体の作りは堅固
であり、魔物に侵入されるまでは過去の貴重な
文献などを保管する書庫として活用されてきた
new:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】 Door</COL>
The largest archaeological site in the Farana Plains, with some areas showing signs of collapse, but the overall structure is solid.
It was once used as a repository for valuable historical documents, storing them until it was invaded by enemies.

old:
古将マグサスを始めとした歴戦の猛者たちが
眠る墓所。水路も兼ねていたが、いつの頃からか
ウィルムが棲みつき、慰霊のために訪れる者は
いなくなった。まれに、副葬品狙いの墓荒らしが
命知らずにも入り込むことがあるらしい
new:
The resting place of seasoned warriors, including the ancient hero Magusas. 
While also serving as a waterway, it has been inhabited by a Wyrm for quite some time now, and those who used to visit to pay their respects have disappeared. 
Occasionally, grave robbers, driven by the desire for burial artifacts, dare to venture in unknowingly.

old:
芯なる樹と聖塔が融合した《始まりの洞》内部
へと続く回廊。塔自体は数千年前から存在する
ものであるが、芯なる樹に支えられていることで
非常に良い状態で保たれている
new: Corridor leading to the Hollow of Beginnings, where the Core Tree and the Holy Tower have merged. Although the tower itself has been in existence for thousands of years, it is kept in very good condition thanks to the support of the Core Tree.

old:
《精霊竜のねぐら》へと続くらせん状の階段を
有した空間。空気中に満ちた竜力の加護か、
これだけの長い階段を上ってもまるで足の痛みを
感じることが無いという
new:
A spiraling staircase leading to the "Spirit Dragon's Roost." 
Perhaps due to the divine protection of the Dragon Force permeating the air, one can ascend this long staircase without feeling any pain in their feet.

old:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
大量の水を湛えた自然の地下洞窟を元に作られた
集水路。今まで水が枯れたことは無く、手入れが
必要無かったことから最低限しか手が入れられて
いない。最近は水竜が棲みついているとの噂もある
new:
<COL ffdc78>[Treasure] Door</COL>
A canal that was built based on a natural underground cave filled with a large amount of water. 
The water has never dried up before and minimal maintenance has been carried out because it has not been necessary. 
There have been rumors recently that water dragons have made it their habitat.

old:
精霊竜が棲む、《芯なる樹》の頂上部
フィンダム大陸中で最も竜力に満ちた
清浄な空間であったが、精霊竜が毒に
侵されたことにより、苦痛と禍々しさに
溢れる場所となった
new:
At the top of the "Core Tree," where the "Spirit Dragon" resides.
The place most filled with "Dragon Force" in the entire continent of Phindym.
It was once a pure space, but due to the Spirit Dragon being tainted by poison, it has become a place filled with pain and malevolence.

old:
《芯なる樹》の太い根が伸び、聖域の影響が
色濃く出た遺跡。入口が崩落してはいるが
そのせいもあってか人が入った形跡は最小限に
保たれている
new:
The thick roots of the "Core Tree" stretch out, and the influence of the Sacred Grounds is strongly felt. 
Although the entrance has collapsed, and perhaps because of that, there are minimal signs of anyone entering.

old:
かつてはフィンダム中から学者たちが集う学研の場で
あった小塔。魔物の襲撃を受けて放棄されたのち
ピクシーの大きな群れが移住した。位の高い
ピクシーは高所を好むため、小塔の上階には群れ
の長もしくは準ずる個体が生息していると思われる
new:
A small tower in the midst of Phindym, where scholars gathered in the past. 
After being abandoned due to enemy raids, a large group of Pixies migrated there. 
Pixies of high rank prefer high places, so it is believed that the leader or a similar individual of the group resides on the upper floor of the tower.

old:
ファーラナ平原の少し奥まった高台に建つ小塔
以前は代々内部で暮らす者たちがいたものの
彼らは二百年近く前に突然塔から出てダナ村に
合流したという。それ以来、たまに掃除に訪れる
者がいる程度で普段は無人となっている
new:
On a slightly secluded hill in Farana Plains, there is a small tower. 
Previously, there were people living inside for generations. 
However, about two hundred years ago, they suddenly left the tower and joined Dana Village. 
Since then, it has been uninhabited, with only occasional visitors for cleaning.
